name: quty
title: QUTy
description: QUTy is a development board based on the Microchip ATtiny1626 AVR microcontroller, designed to teach microcontroller programming in the course EGB202 Microprocessors and Digital Systems. The board features a USB-C interface for programming and serial communication, pushbuttons, a potentiometer, a piezo buzzer and a 2-digit, 7-segment display.
